price: Au wao wameziumba mbingu na ardhi? Bali hawana na yakini.
arabic: أَمۡ خَلَقُواْ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَۚ بَل لَّا يُوقِنُونَ
footnotes: Kwani wao ndio walio ziumba mbingu na ardhi kwa uumbaji mzuri wa pekee wa namna hii? Bali wao hawana na yakini na lolote lilio mwajibikia Muumbaji. Na kwa hivyo ndio wanamshirikisha.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: am khalaqū al-samāwāti wal-arḍa bal lā yūqinūna
